title: Natsume Yuujinchou Shi (Natsume's Book of Friends Season 4)
synopsis: Takashi Natsume, the timid youkai expert and master of the Book of Friends, continues his journey towards self-understanding and acceptance with the help of friends both new and old. His most important ally is still his gluttonous and sake-loving bodyguard, the arrogant but fiercely protective wolf spirit Madaraâ€”or Nyanko-sensei, as Madara is called when in his usual disguise of an unassuming, pudgy cat.
